## parse() function

Returns XML parser transducer, optionally configured with given options. If `src` is also given, returns an iterator instead.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function parse(opts?: Partial<ParseOpts>): Transducer<string, ParseEvent>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opts | <code>Partial&lt;ParseOpts&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Transducer<string, ParseEvent>`
